alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Hardin; Henderson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 5:18PM CDT until May 02 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HENDERSON...NORTHEASTERN HARDIN AND DECATUR COUNTIES... At 518 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sardis, or 15 miles north of Savannah, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Parsons, Decaturville, Sardis, Darden, Montgomery, Scotts Hill, Saltillo, Haney, Hinkle, Pleasant Grove, Mount Tabor, Red Walnut, Cerro Gordo, Thurman, Lick Skillet, Perryville, Gumdale, Wilkinstown, Bath Springs and Five Forks. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
